timeline.bodyText: This always creates the new ArrayList even if it's not required.
timeline.author: mfussenegger

replies.bodyText: i probably could change ArrayList<GeneratedReference> to List<..> and then use List.of() in getOrDefault, but computeIfAbsent should be ok as well, not sure what is better
replies.author: kovrus

timeline.bodyText: I think we could extend the MapBuilder with a putAll and keep this as it was before.
timeline.author: mfussenegger
